document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the chondrichthyans of Papua New Guinea

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Zygaena
lewini
Griffith & Smith, 1834 : 640
, pl. 50. No types known.
Type locality: south coast of Australia [ New Holland ]
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Local synonymy:
Sphyrna lewini
—Whitley, 1949b: 345 (Goodenough Bay); Fraser-Brunner, 1950 : 217 (Menapi); Munro, 1967: 8, pl. 1, fig. 7 (New Guinea); Filewood, 1973 : 2 (PNG); Allen, 1998 : 67 (Milne Bay);
Allen et al. , 2003
: 112 (Milne Bay);
White et al. , 2018
: 186, figs (PNG).

PNG

Remarks: First recorded from PNG by Whitley (1949b) from Goodenough Bay. Commonly caught in a variety of fisheries, from inshore prawn trawling in the Gulf of Papua to pelagic longline fisheries.
